author: gstein
msg: Remove extraneous slash and fix two links.
(): [preferred] has a trailing slash, so remove an extra one in the
description of the currently selected mirror. fix links to .tar.gz.asc

author: fdmanana
msg: Make sure httpc pool doesn't reuse dead connections
Race conditions allowed dead http connections to be added
back to the httpc pool and then be given back to clients.
In extreme cases this could lead to a pool full of dead
Issue identified by Dale Harvey. Thanks.
